channel.title: Webclient moved to Client
channel.description: Okay, I deleted my files to my client a long time ago, but still had the webclient files. I run Ubuntu Linux 11.04 now. The thing is, when I changed everything to client. I put cache into the client as "cache", and then I pointed all of the things that said "C:/.MYSERVER" and changed it to "./cache," it loaded up but a lot of the images didn't show up. Any help please? [b]EDIT[/b]: This is 317 Delta Non-renamed. If you need to see my client files, I can show 'em.

item.title: Webclient moved to Client
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Okay, I deleted my files to my client a long time ago, but still had the webclient files. I run Ubuntu Linux 11.04 now. The thing is, when I changed everything to client. I put cache into the client as “cache”, and then I pointed all of the things that said “C:/.MYSERVER” and changed it to “./cache,” it loaded up but a lot of the images didn’t show up. Any help please?
EDIT: This is 317 Delta Non-renamed. If you need to see my client files, I can show 'em.

Read full topic
